title: Intermittent signalling issues affecting Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issues, trains may have longer dwell times at stations. Pls cater for longer travel time.
[CCL] Due to intermittent train fault/signalling issues, please cater for additional travel time on the CCL today.
[CCL]: Due to intermittent signalling issues, expect an additional 5 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL] Update: Normal service resumed. All commuters are advised to hold onto the handrails as they may experience intermittent braking.
[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling fault, expect additional 5 minutes  of waiting time between Caldecott and Harbour Front.
{CCL] UPDATE: Due to intermittent signalling fault, expect additional 5 mins of waiting time between Dhoby Ghaut / Marina Bay and Paya Lebar
[CCL]: Due to intermittent signalling issues, expect an additional 5-10minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]: Due to intermittent signalling issues, expect an additional 10 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]: Due to intermittent signalling issues, expect an additional 3-5 minutes of travelling time
[CCL]:UPDATE: Due to intermittent signalling issues expect an additional 3-5 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]:UPDATE: Due to intermittent signalling issues expect an additional 5-10 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]:UPDATE: Due to intermittent signalling issues expect an additional 5 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]:UPDATE: All commuters who are standing on board the trains to hold onto the handrails as they may experience intermittent braking.
[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issues expect an additional 5 -10 minutes of travelling time.
[CCL]Due to intermittent signalling issues, pls expect longer travelling time until the end of svc today. More info: https://t.co/teIi6ba8yk
